remarks: Vector addition/subtraction law.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmod4.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmod4.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvaddsub4.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodvaddsub4 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ ( C e. V /\ D e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .+ B ) = ( C .+ D ) <-> ( A .- C ) = ( D .- B ) ) ) $.
